discourse_list.title: March 2022 Reporting for Strategic Finance Core Unit - March 2022

content.content: March 2022 reporting for Strategic Finance Core Unit TL;DR  Inaugural QSR meeting was held on March 11th thanks to key contributions from Growth, Risk, Data Insights, PE, and RWF. We look forward to continuing to build and iterate on this process Continued efforts on standardizing accounting and financial close processes and best practices to be shared with the community Following the passing of the DOI to invest in short-term bonds, we are collaborating with RWF to investigate investing the USDC in the PSM and have started to meet with counterparties to discuss barriers  @adcv performed a cash flow analysis given the current DAI burn rate and gave a presentation on the G&R call on 17th Posted a revision for MIP40 to improve transparency in budget requests  @lyt analyzed stETH collateral deposits on Maker vs AAVE  Building new queries through Dune to better understand vault activity and identify prospective vault users Published Towards taking asset risk - A primer, a first step to diversify MakerDAO balance sheet with direct investments. It is part of the Asset-Liability Management project handle in partnership with Risk. Attended Harvard Blockchain Conference & Career Fair to represent MakerDAO with a number of other Core Unit Facilitators, members, and Delegates Collaborating with Growth and RWF on the Aggressive Growth Strategy Collaborating with Growth, Risk, and @hexonaut on IV parameters and negotiations Researching yield generation and liquidity providing opportunities  MakerDAO @ Harvard Blockchain Conference  2822×2117 823 KB   2822×2117 844 KB   2822×2117 780 KB  Team Expenses  image2238×883 97.1 KB  Public Work March Financial Report February Expense Report MIP40 Amendment Taking asset risk - A primer stETH Stablecoin Share - Maker vs AAVE Team Composition @Aes - Full-time - Facilitator @SebVentures - Full-time - ALM, Financial Infrastructure @lyt - Full-time - Business Analysis @adcv - soon to be Full-time - Financial Analysis @Kayleigh - Part-time - Financial Planning & Analysis @Shravanrajas - Part-time - Data Analysis

discourse_list.title: Reporting for Strategic Finance Core Unit - April 2022

content.content: April 2022 reporting for Strategic Finance Core Unit TLDR;  Continued efforts on standardizing accounting and financial close processes and best practices to be shared with the community Building new queries through Dune to better understand the stablecoin landscape and track vault collateral value through time of our largest borrowers DeFi Stables Market Share, Bridge Balances, Collateral Value Through Time  Ongoing efforts to improve financial reporting quality and accuracy from on-chain data Collaborating with Growth Task Force to build the Maker 2.0 Growth Strategy Engaging with multiple counterparties to source competitive offers for investing structures to deploy the PSM and improve asset productivity Created a proposal to manage the treasury with the goal of earning yield, supporting DAI liquidity, and automating Collaborated with @twblack88 and GovAlpha on clarity improvements to the MIP Core Units processes Worked with community feedback to improve MIP40 budget proposal  Completed lending market analysis involving Maker and major competitors on ETH L1. Completed cross-collateralization market opportunity analysis  Worked with TribeDAO and Maker CUs to lay out a FEI-A vault proposal Posted a model to forecast the balance sheet evolution and analyze the impact of a capital raise Worked with four parties on the short-term bonds proposals Proposed a Signal Request to onboard ETH on our balance sheet  Met with several large MKR holders to discuss strategy and encourage delegation ALM Liquidity Update Posted March Financials and Expenses  Ongoing proactive engagement with CUs to help with supplier sourcing and optimizing CU expenses   SF CU April Expense Summary  image1460×542 40.2 KB
